p: Evaluation of protected areas and genetic diversity. To identify whether the areas with the highest genetic diversity lie within protected areas we also overlaid protected areas on the distribution maps of the sampled populations. Protected area shape files from Mexico were downloaded from the National Commission of Protected Natural Areas (CONANP, www.gob.mx/conanp) and the world database on protected areas ( https://www.iucn.org/theme/protected-areas). Protected areas in Texas were obtained from the Texas Parks and Wildlife Department ( tpwd.texas.gov). Table 2 includes the protected areas within the Chihuahuan Desert.
